Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio

Class SoundRecorder

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.audio.SoundRecorder
Direct Known Subclasses:
org.jsfml.audio.SoundBufferRecorder
public abstract class SoundRecorder extends org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
Abstract base class for sound recorders, which provide functionality to capture audio data.

  • Method Details

    • isAvailable

      public static boolean isAvailable()
      Checks whether audio capturing is available on this system.
      Returns:
      true if audio capturing is available, false otherwise

    • start

      public final void start()
      Starts capturing audio data with a sample rate of 44,100 Hz.

    • start

      public final void start(int sampleRate)
      Starts capturing audio data with the specified sample rate.
      Overrides:
      start in class org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
      Parameters:
      sampleRate - the sample rate in samples per second

    • stop

      public final void stop()
      Stops capturing audio data.
      Overrides:

    • getSampleRate

      public final int getSampleRate()
      Gets the sample rate that audio is being captured with.
      Overrides:
      getSampleRate in class org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
      Returns:
      the audio sample rate in samples per second

    • onStart

      protected abstract boolean onStart()
      Called when the sound recorder starts recording. This method can be implemented by deriving classes to perform any actions necessary before audio recording actually starts.
      Specified by:
      onStart in class org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
      Returns:
      true to start recording after this method is done, false to cancel

    • onProcessSamples

      protected abstract boolean onProcessSamples(short[] samples)
      Called when a new batch of audio samples comes in. Implementing classes can then process the captured audio data. Note that this method will be called in a separate audio capturing thread. Also note that this method is hardcoded to be called every 100ms.
      Specified by:
      onProcessSamples in class org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
      Parameters:
      samples - the 16-bit mono samples that were captured
      Returns:
      true to continue recording after this method is done, false to stop recording

    • onStop

      protected abstract void onStop()
      Called when the audio capture has stopped. Note that this method will be called in a separate audio capturing thread.
      Specified by:
      onStop in class org.jsfml.audio.SoundRecorder
